caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. JOHN GIAMMARINARO,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department.
opinion.attorneys:
Thomas J. Cuff and Milton Pinkus for appellant.
Elvin N. Edwards, District Attorney (Richard H. Brown of counsel), for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Judgment of Appellate Division and that of County Court reversed and new trial ordered for error in the admission of evidence as to other stolen cars.
Concur: CARDOZO, Ch. J., POUND, CRANE, ANDREWS, LEHMAN, KELLOGG and O'BRIEN, JJ.Page 550
